content.text: Match ends, Espanyol 0, Barcelona 2.
Second Half ends, Espanyol 0, Barcelona 2.
Substitution, Espanyol. Cristian Alfonso replaces Cristhian Stuani.
Corner,  Espanyol. Conceded by Javier Mascherano.
Substitution, Espanyol. Cristian Gómez replaces Joan Verdú.
Juan Forlín (Espanyol) is shown the yellow card.
Cesc Fàbregas (Barcelona) is shown the yellow card.
Foul by Diego Colotto (Espanyol).
Cesc Fàbregas (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Goal!  Espanyol 0, Barcelona 2. Pedro (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Xavi with a through ball.
Substitution, Barcelona. Xavi replaces Andrés Iniesta.
Substitution, Barcelona. Cristian Tello replaces Alexis Sánchez.
Alexis Sánchez (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Javi López (Espanyol).
Attempt saved. Dani Alves (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal.
Joan Capdevila (Espanyol) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Second yellow card to Mubarak Wakaso (Espanyol).
Mubarak Wakaso (Espanyol) is shown the yellow card.

Foul by Dani Alves (Barcelona).
Substitution, Espanyol. Simão replaces Víctor Sánchez.
Substitution, Barcelona. Pedro replaces David Villa.
Offside, Barcelona. Cesc Fàbregas tries a through ball, but David Villa is caught offside.

Offside, Barcelona. Alexis Sánchez tries a through ball, but Jordi Alba is caught offside.

Javi López (Espanyol) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

Attempt missed. David Villa (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Dani Alves with a cross.
Attempt missed. Joan Capdevila (Espanyol) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left following a corner.
Corner,  Espanyol. Conceded by Gerard Piqué.
Attempt missed. Cesc Fàbregas (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Thiago Alcántara.

Foul by Cesc Fàbregas (Barcelona).
Attempt missed. David Villa (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Alexandre Song (Barcelona) because of an injury.
Attempt missed. Cristhian Stuani (Espanyol) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Javi López with a headed pass.
Mubarak Wakaso (Espanyol) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Dani Alves (Barcelona).
Second Half begins Espanyol 0, Barcelona 1.
First Half ends, Espanyol 0, Barcelona 1.
